channel.title: Runesource_rebuild v0.3 - netty netw., actor based, basic combat
channel.description:
[size=14pt]This is a runesource project that has been totally revamped.[/size]
I removed the inventory, banking, and equipment for now, the next update will have inventory, banking, trading, and shopping (maybe equipment too).
Updates v0.1
[ul][li]Packaged[/li] [li]Better packet handling[/li] [li]Cleaned up, removed all content[/li][/ul]
Updates v0.2
[ul][li]Actor (Entity) based[/li] [li]Update masks for: animations, hits, graphics, facing[/li] [li]Basic energy system[/li] [li]Python scripting system[/li] [li]Actor based combat (basic)[/li] [li]Actor based movement[/li] [li]Task system that automatically tracks un-walkable/un-stackable tasks[/li] [li]Netty networking (_stuart's implementation)[/li] [li]NPC packets, object packets[/li] [li]Basic character saving[/li][/ul]
Update v0.3:
[ul][li]Removed Python[/li] [li]Hit delays[/li] [li]Item container system that supports every container besides equipment[/li] [li]Graphic delays[/li] [li]Projectiles[/li] [li]Inventory[/li] [li]Item definitions (.txt based)[/li] [li]More combat updates[/li][/ul]
To come:
[ul][li]More combat[/li] [li]Python scripting for most content[/li] [li]Protection from packet throttling[/li] [li]Inventory, Shopping, Trading, and Banking[/li][/ul]
[URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/?qf89q0u109kj9yf"]download[/URL]
Client is MITB 317.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/qHf2Bjx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/DAntNMS.png[/img]

item.title: Runesource_rebuild v0.3 - netty netw., actor based, basic combat
item.dc:creator: @JDETSC JDETSC
item.description:
@JDETSC wrote:

I like what you did here. It actually amazes me, that people like doing work. I hope you reach your goals, and one day end up adding content and hosting it!

ten out of ten.

Read full topic
item.source: Runesource_rebuild v0.3 - netty netw., actor based, basic combat

item.title: Runesource_rebuild v0.3 - netty netw., actor based, basic combat
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Looks alright, though why did you remove the python system?
And also, I read that the netty wasn’t really an improvement to runesource.

Read full topic
